title: Arrival in San Francisco
event: Meet at Airport, Check-in at The Metro Hotel, Dinner at Nopa, Drinks & Live Music at Madrone Art Bar
lodging: The Metro Hotel, 319 Divisadero Street, 3-star, Check-in 3:00 PM, Check-out Feb 15 before 11:00 AM

title: Exploring San Francisco
event: Walk through Panhandle Park, Tea at the Japanese Tea Garden, Picnic at Shakespeare Garden, Miniature Golf & Sundaes at Ghirardelli Square, Golden Gate Bridge visit, Dinner & Nightcap at Bourbon & Branch

title: Travel Day
event: Check out of The Metro Hotel, Airport Lounge Drinks, Flight to Delhi
transportation: Flight from San Francisco to Delhi

title: Arrival & Delhi Exploration
event: Check-in at Nizza East, Breakfast at Turtle Cafe, Sunder Nursery & Humayun's Tomb, Check-in at Ambassador Hotel, Drinks & Food at Khan Market, Visit Deer Park & Hauz Khas, Explore Humayunpur, Live Jazz at The Piano Man
lodging: Nizza East (Airbnb) morning stay, Ambassador Hotel (Taj) check-in at 2:00 PM

title: Delhi Day Out
event: Visit Lodhi Garden, Lunch at Dos in Lodhi Market, Explore National Handicrafts & Handloom Museum or Mehrauli Archaeological Park, Shopping at Khan Market or Connaught Place, Walk past India Gate, Visit Sahil, Vasundra & Family

title: Arrival in Andamans
event: Flight to Andamans, Check-in at Munjoh Ocean Resort, Relax on the beach, Enjoy fresh seafood, Unwind in paradise
transportation: Flight to Port Blair, ferry to Havelock Island

title: Scuba Diving & Sunset Walks
event: Scuba diving at Nemo Reef, Long walk at Radhanagar Beach, Candlelight dinner by the beach, Slow dance under the stars

title: Return from Andamans
event: Fly back from Andamans, Kolkata Layover - Visit Kalighat Temple, Check-in at hotel and relax

title: Agra Adventure with Ishan
event: Train to Agra, Visit Taj Mahal, Explore Agra Fort & Mehtab Bagh, Check-in at Aman Homestay

title: Jaipur Adventure
event: Travel to Jaipur, Visit Hawa Mahal, Explore City Palace & Museum, Stop by Albert Hall Museum, Jantar Mantar & Photoshoot, Sunset at Nahargarh Fort

title: Flight Back to LAX
event: Board flight home, Reflect on the journey, Whisper 'This is only the beginning.'
